page.title: 10THE FLOWER FESTIVAL.
page.content: This year's theme for the annual flower festival was appropriately{"The {Children Of the World".}The centre piece of the 12th festival was the Festival of Flowers in the church. The displays or tableaux portrayed the theme{"Feed the World". Other activities during the 3 day period included a North American square dance, an exhibition of Nene Valley fossils, plus "Of such is the Kingdom" (son et lumiere). In the past {Elizabethan Troubadours}have played. Refreshments were available from a German Beer Garden, a French Bistro, a Japanese Tea Garden, an Italian Ice Cream Parlour and a South Sea Island Paradise! The{money collected}was done so in aid of the local church, Save The Children and Action Research for the Crippled Child.
